text:
It's possible to list the contents of a directory by calling the following URL:

http://www.site.com/%3f.jsp
creator: webmaster@cienciapura.com.br
webmaster@cienciapura.com.br
text:
The configuration I'm using is with apache and mod_jk ( ajp13 ).

Mapping:
JkMount /*.jsp ajp13

Thanks for the help.

creator: Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
text:
Which version of Apache are you using?  With Apache 1.3.20, I get

    Forbidden
    You don't have permission to access /?.jsp on this server

I'm using Tomcat 3.2.4 and the mod_jk.dll from that release.

creator: webmaster@cienciapura.com.br
text: I might try with Linux and apache. That's what I'm using.

creator: glenn@apache.org
text:
Tomcat 3.2 is no longer in development.  Please consider upgrading to
Tomcat 3.3 or 4.1 if this is still a problem.
